title: FRQ Score
stimulusHtml:
NOTE: On the AP Exam, to earn a point for a rubric row, responses will need to meet all criteria for that row.

Points earned:

+1 [Skill 2.B] The response includes a code segment that shows selection.

+1 [Skill 3.A] The response describes two inputs for the program.

Do NOT award a point if:

● the response describes inputs being tested that are implausible, inaccurate, or inconsistent with the program.

+1 [Skill 4.C] The response describes the true and false conditions for the selection statement.

+1 [Skill 4.C] The response identifies the result of each condition.

Do NOT award a point if:

● the identified results of either input are implausible, inaccurate, or inconsistent with the program.
